plugin.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Authentication]
plugin.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Options applied to all auth drivers]

global_param.name: PASSWORD_MINLENGTH
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Password length]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Minimum number of characters required for passwords in the application]

global_param.name: SECURE_LOGIN_FORM
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Secure Login Form]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Raise the security of the login form by disabling autocompletion and remember me feature]

global_param.name: ENABLE_FORGOT_PASSWORD
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Enable Forgot Password]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Add a Forgot Password link at the bottom of the login form]

global_param.name: FORGOT_PASSWORD_ACTION
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Forgot Password Action]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Action to trigger when clicking on Forgot Password. Can be changed to trigger a custom action if you rely on external authentication system.]

global_param.name: USER_CREATE_CELLS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Let user create new cells]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Whether users can create their own cells or not]

global_param.name: USER_CREATE_USERS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Create external users]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Allow the users to create a new user when sharing a folder]

global_param.name: NEWUSERS_EDIT_PARAMETERS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[External users parameters]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[List of parameters to be edited when creating a new shared user.]

global_param.name: SKIP_USER_HISTORY
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Skip user history]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Use this option to avoid automatic reloading of the interface state (last folder, opened tabs, etc)]
CONF_MESSAGE[Maximum number of users displayed in the users autocompleter]
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Users completer limit]
global_param.name: USERS_LIST_COMPLETE_LIMIT

global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Minimum number of characters to trigger the auto completion feature]
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Users completer min chars]
global_param.name: USERS_LIST_COMPLETE_MIN_CHARS

global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Do not load groups and users list if no regexp is entered. Avoid sending large search on LDAP.]
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Make regexp mandatory]
global_param.name: USERS_LIST_REGEXP_MANDATORY
